content: असंगतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not associating with. {@--2@} Incongruity, improbability. {@--3@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech in which a cause and the effect are represented as locally different or separated (in which there is an apparent violation of the relation between cause and effect); भिन्नदेशतयात्यंतं कार्यकारणभूतयोः . युगपद्धर्मयोर्यत्र ख्यातिः सा स्यादसंगतिः .. <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; विरुद्धं भिन्नदेशत्वं कार्यहेत्वोरसंगतिः . विषं जलधरैः पीतं मूर्छिताः पथिकांगनाः .. <ls>Kuval.</ls>
